meanings.definition: Relating to Galen or his medical theories.
meanings.sent1: The galenical approach to medicine focuses on ancient methods.
meanings.sent2: Her galenical knowledge of medical history impressed the professor.
meanings.sent3: The galenical debate at the conference was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His galenical wisdom guided his understanding of traditional medicine.
meanings.sent5: The galenical principles were deeply ingrained in her medical practice.

meanings.definition: A medicinal preparation made from natural ingredients.
meanings.sent1: The herbal tea was a galenical remedy for her cold.
meanings.sent2: He prepared a galenical potion using herbs from his garden.
meanings.sent3: The galenical elixir had a surprisingly pleasant taste.
meanings.sent4: She relied on galenical medicines to maintain her health.
meanings.sent5: The ancient manuscript contained recipes for various galenicals.
